About Professional Guitarist Charles Loehle

Charles Loehle, M.M. Jazz Guitar. A staple of the Atlanta guitar community since 1996, Charles pairs high-level academic training from Georgia State University with 25+ years of practical teaching experience.

Specializing in jazz improvisation, music theory, and foundational technique, Charles offers students a sophisticated path to guitar mastery, whether in person or via Zoom.
